metadata.title: CVE-2022-39347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free remote desktop protocol library and clients. Affectedversions of FreeRDP are missing path canonicalization and base path checkfor `drive` channel. A malicious server can trick a FreeRDP based client toread files outside the shared directory. This issue has been addressed inversion 2.9.0 and all users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgradeshould not use the `/drive`, `/drives` or `+home-drive` redirection switch.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
